name: Pager
tagline: Pager is a jQuery pagination plugin,you can easily use in your project with jQuery.
body:
### How to use it #####1. Add below in your html file. ```html ``` #####2. Add pager container ```html
``` #####3. init pager like below ```javascript ``` #####4. result ![pager01](http://7oxjbb.com1.z0.glb.clouddn.com/pagerp1.jpg) ### custom pager lang You can pass the corresponding options to custom pager lang. ```javascrpt $('.J-pagerwraper2').pager({ curno : 1, total:22, onchange:function(_data) { alert(_data.index); }, lang: { firstPageText: 'Home', firstPageTipText: 'Home', lastPageText: 'End', lastPageTipText: 'End', prePageText: '', nextPageTipText: 'Next', totalPageBeforeText: 'total', totalPageAfterText: 'pages', currPageBeforeText: 'current:', currPageAfterText: '', totalInfoSplitStr: '/', gopageBeforeText: ' JumpTo', gopageButtonOkText: 'Go', gopageAfterText: '' } }); ``` Result ![pager02](http://7oxjbb.com1.z0.glb.clouddn.com/pagerp2.jpg) ### You can achieve two pagers move together by using 'ref' option. ```javascript ``` Result: ![pagerlinked](http://7oxjbb.com1.z0.glb.clouddn.com/pagerlinked.gif) ### You Can custom style by change less file and recompile ###All Options ```javascript Pager.DEFAULTS = { curno: 4, //current pageno limit: 10, show: 5, total: 122, //total number of pages totalRecords: 0, //total number of records isShowFirstPageBtn: true, isShowLastPageBtn: true, isShowTotalPage: true, isShowCurPageNo: true, isShowTotalRecords: true, isGoPage: true, onchange : function(){},// callback when pageno change lang: { firstPageText: '首页', firstPageTipText: '首页', lastPageText: '尾页', lastPageTipText: '尾页', prePageText: '上一页', prePageTipText: '上一页', nextPageText: '下一页', nextPageTipText: '下一页', totalPageBeforeText: '共', totalPageAfterText: '页', currPageBeforeText: '当前第', currPageAfterText: '页', totalInfoSplitStr: '/', gopageBeforeText: ' 转到', gopageButtonOkText: '确定', gopageAfterText: '页' } }; ```
